photo.description: Path to the photo of the person, relative to the input file.
photo.title: Photo

phone.description: Country code should be included. For example, +1 for the United States.
phone.title: Phone

sections.description: The sections of the CV, like Education, Experience, etc.
sections.title: Sections

degree.description: The type of the degree, such as BS, BA, PhD, MS.
degree.title: Degree

date.description: The date can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY, or as an arbitrary string such as "Fall 2023."
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The event's start date, written in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The event's end date, written in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is ongoing, type “present” or provide only the start date.
end_date.title: End Date

date.description: The date can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY, or as an arbitrary string such as "Fall 2023."
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The event's start date, written in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The event's end date, written in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is ongoing, type “present” or provide only the start date.
end_date.title: End Date

language.description: The language as an ISO 639 alpha-2 code. It is used for hyphenation patterns. The default value is 'en'.
language.title: Language

phone_number_format.description: If 'national', phone numbers are formatted without the country code. If 'international', phone numbers are formatted with the country code. The default value is 'national'.
phone_number_format.title: Phone Number Format

page_numbering_template.description:
The template of the page numbering. The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- PAGE_NUMBER: The current page number
- TOTAL_PAGES: The total number of pages
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
The default value is "NAME - Page PAGE_NUMBER of TOTAL_PAGES".
page_numbering_template.title: Page Numbering Template

last_updated_date_template.description:
The template of the last updated date. The following placeholders can be used:
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
The default value is "Last updated in TODAY".
last_updated_date_template.title: Last Updated Date Template

date_template.description:
The template of the date. The following placeholders can be used:
-FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".
date_template.title: Date Template

month.description: Translation of the word "month" in the locale.
month.title: Translation of "month"

months.description: Translation of the word "months" in the locale.
months.title: Translation of "months"

year.description: Translation of the word "year" in the locale.
year.title: Translation of "year"

years.description: Translation of the word "years" in the locale.
years.title: Translation of "years"

present.description: Translation of the word "present" in the locale.
present.title: Translation of "present"

to.description: The word or character used to indicate a range in the locale (e.g., "2020 - 2021").
to.title: Translation of "to"

abbreviations_for_months.description: Abbreviations of the months in the locale.
abbreviations_for_months.title: Abbreviations of Months

full_names_of_months.description: Full names of the months in the locale.
full_names_of_months.title: Full Names of Months

date.description: The date can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY, or as an arbitrary string such as "Fall 2023."
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The event's start date, written in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The event's end date, written in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is ongoing, type “present” or provide only the start date.
end_date.title: End Date

template.description: The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
template.title: Template

url.description: If DOI is provided, it will be ignored.
url.title: URL

date.description: The date can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY, or as an arbitrary string such as "Fall 2023."
date.title: Date

main_column_first_row_template.description: The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_first_row_template.title: Main Column First Row Template

main_column_second_row_template.description: The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_second_row_template.title: Main Column Second Row Template

main_column_second_row_without_journal_t.description: The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_second_row_without_journal_t.title: Main Column Second Row Without Journal Template

main_column_second_row_without_url_templ.description: The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_second_row_without_url_templ.title: Main Column Second Row Without Url Template

date_and_location_column_template.description: The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
date_and_location_column_template.title: Date And Location Column Template

date.description: The date that will be used everywhere (e.g., in the output file names, last updated date, computation of time spans for the events that are currently happening, etc.). The default value is the current date.
date.title: Date

render_command.description: RenderCV's `render` command settings. They are the same as the command line arguments. CLI arguments have higher priority than the settings in the input file.
render_command.title: Render Command Settings

bold_keywords.description: The keywords that will be bold in the output. The default value is an empty list.
bold_keywords.title: Bold Keywords

sort_entries.description: How the entries should be sorted based on their dates. The available options are 'reverse-chronological', 'chronological', and 'none'. The default value is 'none'.
sort_entries.title: Sort Entries

design.description: The file path to the yaml file containing the `design` field separately.
design.title: `design` Field's YAML File

rendercv_settings.description: The file path to the yaml file containing the `rendercv_settings` field separately.
rendercv_settings.title: `rendercv_settings` Field's YAML File

locale.description: The file path to the yaml file containing the `locale` field separately.
locale.title: `locale` Field's YAML File

output_folder_name.description:
The name of the folder where the output files will be saved. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
- NAME: The name of the CV owner
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".
The default value is "rendercv_output".
output_folder_name.title: Output Folder Name

pdf_path.description:
The path to copy the PDF file to. If it is not provided, the PDF file will not be copied. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
- NAME: The name of the CV owner
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".
The default value is null.
pdf_path.title: PDF Path

- MONTH: Month as a number

dont_generate_html.description: A boolean value to determine whether the HTML file will be generated. The default value is False.
dont_generate_html.title: Don't Generate HTML

dont_generate_markdown.description: A boolean value to determine whether the Markdown file will be generated. The default value is "false".
dont_generate_markdown.title: Don't Generate Markdown

dont_generate_pdf.description: A boolean value to determine whether the PDF file will be generated. The default value is False.
dont_generate_pdf.title: Don't Generate PDF

dont_generate_png.description: A boolean value to determine whether the PNG file will be generated. The default value is False.
dont_generate_png.title: Don't Generate PNG

watch.description: A boolean value to determine whether to re-run RenderCV when the inputfile is updated. The default value is "false".
watch.title: Re-run RenderCV When the Input File is Updated

username.description: The username used in the social network. The link will be generated automatically.
username.title: Username
